data.eml:eml: Description of the female of Labena madoricola González-Moreno & Bordera, 2015 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Labeninae), with new records of Labena species from Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume González-Moreno, Alejandra, Bordera, Santiago (2017): Description of the female of Labena madoricola González-Moreno & Bordera, 2015 (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Labeninae), with new records of Labena species from Mexico. Zootaxa 4338 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.1.11
